about_the_game:
Dive into the epic soundscapes of Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel, composed by the talented Robert Bruckmayer. This official soundtrack brings the battles and haunting beauty of Hel's realms straight to your playlist.

Featuring a masterful blend of Nordic-inspired melodies, thundering percussion, and heart-pounding orchestration, this collection captures the spirit of your journey against the hordes. Whether you're preparing for battle or savoring the calm after the storm, these tracks will transport you back to the world of Jotunnslayer.
